Body: How can I get rid of notification icons for Skype in particular, but any app in general when the app was killed using one of the many available task managers, but the notification icon still remains on the notification bar (that is the part that is persistent at the top of the screen in Jellybean)?Device: Nexus 7 (2013), Android 4.3
Title: Getting rid of stale notification icons in the notification _bar_?

history.Text: How can I get rid of notification icons for Skype in particular, but any app in general when the app was killed using one of the many available task managers, but the notification icon still remains on the notification bar?Bonus points if you can tell me how to quit the latest Skype without having to resort to some task manager.Device: Nexus 7 (2013), Android 4.3
Getting rid of stale Skype notification icons?
